description: Update an existing project labor classification
permissions: Allowed for admins or users who are manager members of the project's broker.
side_effects: Updates basic and/or fringe hourly rates on the project labor classification.
validation_notes: Requires the <id> argument (project labor classification ID). At least one of --basic-hourly-rate or --fringe-hourly-rate must be provided. basic-hourly-rate and fringe-hourly-rate must be numeric values greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --basic-hourly-rate
flags.validation: Must be a numeric value greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --fringe-hourly-rate
flags.validation: Must be a numeric value greater than 0 when provided.
